DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate effect aroma massage sleep quality nurse staff night shift .
DOC.brief_title: Assessments Stress Quality Sleep/Life Night-shift Nurses Doctors
DOC.detailed_description: Night shift increase physical psychological pressure , even affect sleep quality . This study aim evaluate effect aroma massage sleep quality nurse night shift life-style modification and/or aroma massage . The investigator adopt Randomized Controlled Trial ( RCT ) study . The investigator expect aroma massage would improve sleep quality night shift .
DOC.criteria: ShiftWork Nurses Staff Diabetes mellitus , cardiovascular disease psychological disorder
